Ummah Cabinet [Non-Profit • Private].bio: The executive body responsible for coordinating Ummah-wide initiatives and policies.

Ummah Governance [Non-Profit • Private].bio: Oversees institutional frameworks and governance structures within the Ummah.

Ummah Federal Government [Non-Profit • P.bio: Manages federal-level administration and cross-jurisdictional coordination.

Ummah Personal Counselor [Non-Profit • P.bio: Provides spiritual guidance and personal counseling services to community members.
